pr_title: [WFCORE-5198] Ignore deployment failures such as duplicate classes

timeline.bodyText:
I assume what we are really trying to catch is a RuntimeException thrown by EclipseTransformer, not a java.lang.Error. So this catch should be limited to RuntimeException.
Beyond a general code standard thing of avoiding suppressing Error, this matters because if we bypass trying again for deployments that use DeploymentAttributes.CONTENT_INPUT_STREAM_INDEX, then for those we are going to have to rethrow the exception.
timeline.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText:
Also, I think this catch should be for a try block that only includes L220.  We want to react to failures in deploymentTransformer.transform, not to anything that happens with L221's contentRepository.addContent.
Creating a method for the L220 and the try/catch would be cleaner looking.
replies.author: bstansberry
